name: Peach Territory
description:
This is an interactive novel game, also called visual novel, also called text adventure, also called avg game, with multiple endings and rich plot

The beauty is rich

The various postures of the young lady, the seductive sorrows, the scent of first love

The plot is rich

It is about the male protagonist jumping off the cliff into the peach blossom realm, a place isolated from the world for thousands of years
Meet the heroine here, practice, fall in love, become stronger, and finally revenge with the heroine every day.
Multiple endings

Something to say

This is the first time I tried to make this avg type of game. I have seen a lot of fantasy fairy cultivating novels and animations. I created an avg beauty love game that meets the appetite of most otakus, and brings you the scent of first love.
